jcr:content.jcr:title: Give Out But Don't Give Up

contentheadline.headline: Give Out But Don't Give Up

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Give Out But Don't Give Up | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Primal Scream]] | Cover = Give_out_but_don't_give_up_album_cover.jpg | Released = March, 1994 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Alternative rock]], [[indie rock]], [[hard rock]] | Length = 61:00 | Label = [[Creation Records]]<br/>[[Sire Records]] <small>(US)</small> | Producer = [[David Bianco]], [[George Clinton (funk musician)|George Clinton]], [[Tom Dowd]], [[George Drakoulias]] | Last album = ''[[Screamadelica]]''<br/>(1991) | This album = '''''Give Out But Don't Give Up'''''<br/>(1994) | Next album = ''[[Vanishing Point (Primal Scream album)|Vanishing Point]]''<br/>(1997) }}{{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{rating|2.5|5}} [http://www.allmusic.com/album/give-out-but-dont-give-up-r194056 link] |rev2= ''[[Entertainment Weekly]]''|rev2Score= (B+) [http://www.ew.com/ew/article/0,,301811,00.html link] |rev3= ''[[Q magazine|Q]]''|rev3Score= {{rating|4|5}} <small>[http://www.q4music.com/nav?page=q4music.review.redirect&fixture_review=118183&resource=118183&fixture_artist=146596 December 2000]</small>|noprose=yes}} '''''Give Out But Don't Give Up''''' is the fourth studio album by British rock band [[Primal Scream]]. It is the follow-up to their breakthrough album ''[[Screamadelica]]'', and is a massive departure in sound from that album. Whereas ''[[Screamadelica]]'' was a primarily a [[psychedelic music|psychedelic]] album, ''Give Out But Don't Give Up'' is influenced by [[classic rock]] and [[blues]]. The cover image is from seminal American photographer [[William Eggleston]]. The album reached the #22 position on ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard's]]'' [[Top Heatseekers|Heatseekers chart]]. ==Track listing== All tracks written by [[Bobby Gillespie]], [[Andrew Innes]] and Robert Young, unless noted. # "Jailbird" - 3:46 # "[[Rocks (song)|Rocks]]" - 3:37 # "(I'm Gonna) Cry Myself Blind" - 4:30 # "Funky Jam" - 5:24 # "Big Jet Plane" - 4:15 # "Free" - 5:30 # "Call on Me"- 3:50 # "Struttin'" - 8:29 # "Sad and Blue" - 3:27 # "Give Out But Don't Give Up" ([[George Clinton (funk musician)|George Clinton]], [[Bobby Gillespie]], [[Andrew Innes]], Robert Young) - 6:16 # "I'll Be There for You" - 6:34 ==2009 Japan Reissue== A two-CD edition of Give Out But Don't Give Up was released as part of a deluxe series consisting of their fourth through eighth albums. The first disc includes original album with four bonus tracks; the second includes an additional ten B-sides, remixes and live tracks. ===Disc 1=== # "Jailbird" - 3:46 # "[[Rocks (song)|Rocks]]" - 3:37 # "(I'm Gonna) Cry Myself Blind" - 4:30 # "Funky Jam" - 5:24 # "Big Jet Plane" - 4:15 # "Free" - 5:30 # "Call on Me"- 3:50 # "Struttin'" - 8:29 # "Sad and Blue" - 3:27 # "Give Out But Don't Give Up" ([[George Clinton (funk musician)|George Clinton]], [[Bobby Gillespie]], [[Andrew Innes]], Robert Young)- 6:16 # "I'll Be There for You" - 6:34 # "Everybody Needs Somebody" - 5:22 # "Rocks (Live at Glastonbury)" - 3:56 # "Rocks (Jimmy Miller Remix)" - 3:42 # "Rockers Dub (Kris Needs Mix)" - 5:04 ===Disc 2=== # "Funky Jam (Club Mix)" - 5:25 # "Funky Jam (Super Droog Mix)" - 8:30 # "Jailbird (The Dust Brothers Mix)" - 5:39 # "Jailbird (The Toxic Trio Stay Free Mix)" - 10:28 # "Jailbird (Sweeney 2 Sabres of Paradise Mix)" - 5:48 # "Jailbird (Weatherall Dub Chapter 3 Mix)" - 12:49 # "Struttin' (Back In Our Minds)" - 9:54 # "Give Out But Don't Give Up (Portishead Remix)" - 5:51 # "Ramblin' Rose (Live)" - 2:28 # "I'm Losing More Than I'll Ever Have (Live)" - 4:52 ==Personnel== *[[Bobby Gillespie]] - [[lead vocals]] *Denise Johnson - [[singing|vocals]] (lead vocals on "Funky Jam", "Free" and "Give Out But Don't Give Up") *[[George Clinton (funk musician)|George Clinton]] - vocals (lead vocals on "Funky Jam" and "Give Out But Don't Give Up") *Jackie Johnson - vocals *Susan Marshall - vocals *Robert Young - [[guitar]] *[[Andrew Innes]] - guitar *[[Martin Duffy (musician)|Martin Duffy]] - [[keyboard instrument|keyboards]] *[[Jim Dickinson]] - keyboards *[[Amp Fiddler]] - keyboards *[[Benmont Tench]] - keyboards *[[David Hood]] - [[bass guitar|bass]] *[[George Drakoulias]] - bass, [[drum kit|drums]] *Henry Olsen - bass *Marco Nelson - bass *[[Roger Hawkins]] - drums *[[Tony Brock]] - drums *[[Toby Tomanov|Phillip "Toby" Tomanov]] - drums *Greg Morrow - [[percussion instrument|percussion]] *David Minnick - percussion *[[The Memphis Horns]] (Andrew Love and Wayne Jackson) - [[horn section]] *Charlie Jacobs - [[harmonica]] *[[William Eggleston]] - [[cover photography]] {{Primal Scream}} [[Category:Primal Scream albums]] [[Category:1994 albums]] [[Category:Creation Records albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by George Drakoulias]] [[Category:Albums produced by Tom Dowd]]
